title: january 26: diamonds and more
description:
In this episode of 365 days with mxmtoon, Maia talks about the discovery of the world’s largest diamond, and moves on to some of the problems in the diamond industry writ large. After, she tells us about the Gen Z legend who swept five Grammys in one night. Listen to this episode today and make sure you’re following along with the daily updates @365daysmxmtoon on all platforms.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
